summary:
This mod simply changes the thunder sound used in unrelenting force to Roger Daltrey's Scream at the End of "Won't Get Fooled Again"

It also plays during storm call although it is barely audible.
descriptionHtml:
*Version 1.1 Compatible with Nexus Mod Manager*

*Video added to see it in action*

This mod simply changes the thunder sound used in unrelenting force to Roger Daltrey's Scream at the End of "Won't Get Fooled Again"

It also plays during storm call although it is barely audible.

Should work for all races equally, as it only changes the thunder sound in the shout, not the shout words themselves. Also works for all levels of the shout learned.

Installation: Use Nexus Mod manager or manually place data folder into your skyrim directory,
Vista and Win 7 , Program Files (x86) / Steam / SteamApps / common / skyrim
XP , Program Files / Steam / SteamApps / common / skyrim

Manual Uninstall: Remove,
voc_shout_fx_unrelentingforce_a_01
voc_shout_fx_unrelentingforce_a_02
voc_shout_fx_unrelentingforce_b_01
voc_shout_fx_unrelentingforce_c_01

From thunder folder, found in,
(Win 7 and Vista) Program Files (x86) / Steam / SteamApps / common / skyrim / data / sound / fx / voc /shout / fx / unrelentingforce / thunder

(XP) Program Files / Steam / SteamApps / common / skyrim / data / sound / fx / voc /shout / fx / unrelentingforce / thunder

Enjoy :) ~pondcypress
author: pondcypress
